Package com.pandora.config

Class Variable

java.lang.Object
com.pandora.config.Variable
All Implemented Interfaces:
VariableConfiguration
Direct Known Subclasses:
Specie
public abstract class Variable extends Object implements VariableConfiguration
The Variable class is an abstract implementation of the VariableConfiguration interface, providing basic functionality for a variable within the PANDORA model.

This class includes methods for retrieving and setting the index, and accessing the logger associated with the variable for logging messages and events.

Version:
0.0.1
Author:
Wim Joost van Hoek

  • Method Details

    • getIndex

      public int getIndex()
      Retrieves the index associated with the variable configuration. The index represents the position of the variable within the overall configuration.
      Specified by:
      getIndex in interface VariableConfiguration
      Returns:
      The index of the variable configuration.

    • setIndex

      public void setIndex(int indexParam) throws Exception
      Sets the index for the variable. This method can only be called once, preventing multiple index assignments for the same variable.
      Parameters:
      indexParam - The index to be set for the variable.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an attempt is made to set the index multiple times for the same variable.

    • getLog

      public org.slf4j.Logger getLog()
      Retrieves the logger associated with the variable. The logger is used for logging messages and events related to the variable.
      Returns:
      The logger for the variable.
